mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_RESUME (RES_IDX,RES_TITLE, USER_ID, CVL_TITLE_FIR, CVL_TITLE_SEC, CVL_TITLE_THR, CVL_CONTENT_FIR, CVL_CONTENT_SEC, CVL_CONTENT_THR) values(sc_res_idx.nextval ,#{resTitle}, #{userId}, #{cvlTitleFir},#{cvlTitleSec}, #{cvlTitleThr}, #{cvlContentFir}, #{cvlContentSec}, #{cvlContentThr})
